channel.title: Devops on Jeff Smith
channel.link:
http://localhost:3000/tags/devops/Recent content in Devops on Jeff SmithHugo -- gohugo.ioen-usSat, 26 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000
ReInstall Youtrack service on widowshttp://localhost:3000/notes/reinstall-youtrack-service-on-widows/Sat, 26 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/reinstall-youtrack-service-on-widows/From youtrack\bin…. youtrack.bat service install --force /runAsSystem
Convert mercurial repository to githttp://localhost:3000/notes/convert-mercurial-repository-to-git/Wed, 16 Aug 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/convert-mercurial-repository-to-git/Clone fast-export locally to use clone existing new repos or init setup python mercurial via virtualenv and pip in new repos using env run: ~/fast-export/hg-fast-export.sh -r /home/fatty/local/dev/iq-code/sexy-www/ -A user-map.txt git checkout HEAD…done
Generate cloudfront ssl certificateshttp://localhost:3000/notes/generate-cloudfront-ssl-certificates/Mon, 31 Jul 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/generate-cloudfront-ssl-certificates/Basically… Generate csr openssl req \ -sha256 \ -new -newkey \ rsa:2048 -nodes \ -keyout www.jeffsmithdev.net.key \ -out www.jeffsmithdev.net.csr Download certs & prepare cat COMODORSADomainValidationSecureServerCA.crt > chain.crt cat www_JeffSmithDev_net.crt > ServerCertificate.cer Upload aws iam upload-server-certificate --server-certificate-name JeffSmithDev-net --certificate-body file://ServerCertificate.cer --private-key file://www.jeffsmithdev.net.key --certificate-chain file://chain.crt --path /cloudfront/ssl/ List aws iam list-server-certificates Delete aws iam delete-server-certificate --server-certificate-name JeffSmithDev-net From https://bryce.fisher-fleig.org/blog/setting-up-ssl-on-aws-cloudfront-and-s3/
Install aws cli on arch linuxhttp://localhost:3000/notes/install-aws-cli-on-arch-linux/Sat, 29 Jul 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/install-aws-cli-on-arch-linux/packer python-pip sudo pip install –upgrade awscli aws configure vim .aws/config and add [preview] cloudfront = true
Invalidate all files on cloudfront with aws clihttp://localhost:3000/notes/invalidate-all-files-on-cloudfront-with-aws-cli/Sat, 29 Jul 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/invalidate-all-files-on-cloudfront-with-aws-cli/aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id ABCDEFGHIJK --paths /\*
Sync local files to S3 with aws clihttp://localhost:3000/notes/sync-local-files-to-s3-with-aws-cli/Sat, 29 Jul 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/sync-local-files-to-s3-with-aws-cli/aws s3 sync . s3://fattyfiles.jeffsmithdev.net --delete
Kill an app running on a specific port under linuxhttp://localhost:3000/notes/kill-an-app-running-on-a-specific-port-under-linux/Thu, 20 Jul 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/kill-an-app-running-on-a-specific-port-under-linux/fuser -k 8080/tcp
Install vagrant vmware license filehttp://localhost:3000/notes/install-vagrant-vmware-license-file/Thu, 11 May 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/install-vagrant-vmware-license-file/vagrant plugin install vagrant-vmware-workstation vagrant plugin license vagrant-vmware-workstation ~/license.lic
Simple rsync commandhttp://localhost:3000/notes/simple-rsync-command/Wed, 11 Jan 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/simple-rsync-command/Sync directories: (Dont add a trailing slash on src folder our you miss a level…idiot) rsync -aP /home/fatty/data-shared fatty@192.168.101.155:/home/fatty/ Useful flags: --delete --dry-run
Basic apache modules for a reverse proxyhttp://localhost:3000/notes/basic-apache-modules-for-a-reverse-proxy/Thu, 21 Jul 2016 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/basic-apache-modules-for-a-reverse-proxy/sudo a2enmod proxy proxy_http headers expires rewrite suexec ssl
How to create init.d scriptshttp://localhost:3000/notes/how-to-create-init.d-scripts/Fri, 13 May 2016 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/how-to-create-init.d-scripts/sudo chmod +x /etc/init.d/FattyServer sudo chown root:root /etc/init.d/FattyServer sudo update-rc.d FattyServer defaults sudo update-rc.d FattyServer enable sudo update-rc.d FattyServer defaults sudo update-rc.d FattyServer enable
